item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tell HN: John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem, has died (660 points | 61 comments)
2. "A Course of Pure Mathematics" – G. H. Hardy (1921) [pdf] (47 points | 6 comments)
3. Dumping Memory to Bypass BitLocker on Windows 11 (122 points | 93 comments)
4. Jack Elam and the Fly in 'Once Upon a Time in the West' (29 points | 4 comments)
5. Beyond Gradient Averaging in Parallel Optimization (8 points | 1 comment)
6. Learning Solver Design: Automating Factorio Balancers (94 points | 11 comments)
7. Coding Font Selection 'Tournament' (18 points | 13 comments)
8. The Homa Network Protocol (41 points | 6 comments)
9. Execution units are often pipelined (135 points | 65 comments)
10. Curl-Impersonate (341 points | 79 comments)
11. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (142 points | 74 comments)
12. How Well Do LLMs Generate Code for Different Application Domains? (34 points | 4 comments)
13. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (275 points | 97 comments)
14. Ts_zip: Text Compression Using Large Language Models (90 points | 30 comments)
15. RubyConf 2024: Cloud Native Buildpack Hackday (and other Ruby deploy tools, too) (23 points | 2 comments)
16. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (155 points | 47 comments)
17. Beyond BLE: Cracking Open the Black-Box of RF Microcontrollers [video] (85 points | 10 comments)
18. Where is James Bond? Trapped in an ugly stalemate with Amazon (100 points | 185 comments)
19. Fun facts about SQLite (265 points | 112 comments)
20. A Tricycle of the Mind (26 points | 12 comments)
21. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (81 points | 9 comments)
22. YouTuber won DMCA fight with fake Nintendo lawyer by detecting spoofed email (200 points | 82 comments)
23. Performance of LLMs on Advent of Code 2024 (19 points | 7 comments)
24. China to Build Thorium Molten-Salt Reactor in 2025 (13 points | 5 comments)
25. Show HN: I built open source file sharing solution using AWS S3 (50 points | 22 comments)
26. Empirical Study of Test Generation with LLM's (31 points | 13 comments)
27. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
28. US credit card defaults jump to highest level since 2010 (161 points | 127 comments)
29. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (284 points | 290 comments)
30. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (202 points | 72 comments)
